english: He invited the leaders of the puerto rican independence party to his inauguration and unveiled a status of che guevara a few days later .
chinese: 他邀请波多黎各独立党的领导人参加他的就职典礼，过了几天又举行了切格瓦拉塑像的揭幕典礼。

english: You ' re missing the 1 789 inaugural , though
chinese: 你缺1789年就职典礼的那一枚

english: The inauguration took place on a bright , cold , and windy day
chinese: 就职典礼那天天气晴朗，寒风凛冽。

english: There ' s the inauguration , thanksgiving , new years , easter
chinese: 还有总统就职典礼感恩节，新年，复活节

english: Welcoming remarks at the treasury markets association inauguration ceremony
chinese: 于财资市场公会就职典礼仪式
就职典礼造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The inauguration of a president of the united states takes place on january 20
chinese: 美国总统的就职典礼于一月二十日举行。

english: He did not attend the inauguration of he next president , thomas jefferson
chinese: 他没有参加下任总统托马斯?杰弗逊的就职典礼。

english: The usccc members attend president bush ' s inaugural ceremony on jan . 21 , 2005
chinese: 2005年1月21日，美国华商会诸多成员受邀参加布希总统就职典礼。

english: Today s congregation is special because a new vice chancellor is being installed
chinese: 今天的毕业典礼殊不寻常，因为大学新任校长的就职典礼也同时举行。

english: It is now our privilege to witness his installation as vice - chancellor of the chinese university of hong kong
chinese: 我们能够出席新任校长就职典礼这个盛会，实在与有荣焉。
